name: @sonabuild/protocols
description: Open-source protocol definitions for Sona attested transactions
author: Asymmetric Information Inc.

scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && bun run build:enclave && bun run build:solend && bun run build:jupiter && bun run build:wallet
scripts.build:check: bun --eval "Promise.all([import('./dist/enclave.bundle.js'), import('./dist/solend.bundle.js'), import('./dist/jupiter.bundle.js'), import('./dist/wallet.bundle.js')]).then(() => console.log('✓ All bundles import successfully')).catch(e => { console.error('✗ Bundle import failed:', e.message); process.exit(1); })"
scripts.prepublishOnly: bun test && bun run build && bun run build:check
scripts.patch: bun test && bun run build && npm version patch && npm publish
scripts.minor: bun test && bun run build && npm version minor && npm publish
scripts.major: bun test && bun run build && npm version major && npm publish
